card.title: Introduction
card.author: Ralph Wiggum
card.shortDescription: This killz primer/paint one-coat application paste tastes like burning.

card.title: Greetings
card.author: Mr. Big
card.shortDescription: I will no longer make git commits with the commit message, 'toasted turkey scrumptious sandwiches.' I apologize for the prior incovenience.

card.title: MORE
card.author: El Liver Kingo
card.shortDescription: PRIMALS - are you a sad popsicle? Simping through life instead of SPARTAN Warrior-ing it? Then how about a fistful of blood-fresh antelope liver!? ELK - OUT!

card.title: excuse me
card.author: Spiffy Cliffy
card.shortDescription: is the local bob evans open past 10 pm.. and will the beautiful tatiana be serving there tonight. google search. no i don't give facebook permission to post this.onions
